title: Jennifer Rioux - Ayurvedic Medicine, Yoga Therapy
description: Jennifer Rioux holds a PhD in medical and cultural anthropology, specializing instudy of the integrative medicine movement.
cleaned_text: Herbalism and Aromatherapy Jennifer Rioux holds a PhD in medical and cultural anthropology, specializing in study of the integrative medicine movement and professionalization of holistic healers. She is an [Ayurvedic](https://gwcim.com/wp22/services/ayurvedic-medicine-and-ayurvedic-yoga-therapy/) Doctor, certified Yoga Therapist, registered East-West Herbalist and Clinical Aromatherapist in private practice for 22 years. Dr. Rioux has been on the faculty and conducted research at University of Arizona and University of New Mexico medical schools and at the University of North Carolina - Chapel Hill. She served two terms on the Board of the National Ayurvedic Medical Association, leading the initial development of standards for the profession, and is on the Advisory Board of the International Association of Yoga Therapists. Dr. Rioux offers [Ayurvedic Medicine Consultations,](https://gwcim.com/services/ayurvedic-medicine-and-ayurvedic-yoga-therapy/) Ayurvedic Yoga Therapy sessions and other types of private sessions.
